        public String run(Map<String,String> args)
           throws LuigiError
        Run this template with given arguments, then return the result as a String.
        Parameters:
        args - Template arguments.
        Throws:
        UnknownKeyError - If a key specified in the template does not exist.
        UnknownFilterError - If a filter specified in the template does not exist.
        FilterError - If a given filter fails.

        Parameters:
        template - Template string.
        args - Template arguments.
        filters - Template filters.
        Returns:
        Template expansion result.

        FilterError - If a given filter fails.
